body:
Due to an internal bug regarding the handling of scalars (ndim must be 0) in numpy prior to 1.15.0, openPMD-api will require the latest numpy 1.15+.

Since there is a small regression with datetime pickling in 1.15.0 from the required fix and spack only packages 1.15.1 currently, we depend on 1.15.1 in the recipe.
title: openPMD-api: ^py-numpy@1.15+
